<rule id="springboot-webmvc-to-quarkus-01000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <!-- Spring component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-webflux" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring Boot component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-webflux" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring component in compiled application condition -->
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-webflux" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="13" title="Spring WebFlux is not supported by Quarkus">
                    <message>
                        Spring WebFlux is not supported by Quarkus

                        If the application needs a reactive stack, please refer to the following links to get more information.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/vertx" title="Quarkus - Using Eclipse Vert.x"/>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/reactive-routes" title="Quarkus - Using Reactive Routes"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
